recommendations: ‚ÄúFLEXIBLE, ORIGINAL AND LOYAL I have worked with Paul Zoicas on a paper/teamwork from 2011 and 2012. We collaborated on an International Project Management Paper, which produced excellent results. He completed a project management report on the failed international project management practice in the capacity building projects in Afghanistan. In groupwork, he demonstrates an ability to quickly spot opportunities and implement his ideals. He is curious to understand those around him and shows this in an accepting and flexible manner. At work, he is adaptable, welcome new ideas and new information and patient with complicated situations. He demonstrates this ability in successfully collaborating with 8 others with totally different academic and cultural backgrounds.‚Äù Show less
